00019 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00020 from KeyboardWidget import *
00021 from KeypadWidget import *
00022 
00023 ## @brief The PosEventFilter class provides an eventFilter that shows a Keyboard for touchscreen 
00024 # environemnts when a QLineEdit or QTextEdit gets the focus (is clicked by the user).
00025 #
00026 # In order to enable the Keyboard (and Keypad) in an application, simply install
00027 # it with 'app.installEventFilter( Koo.Pos.PosEventFilter( mainWindow ) )'
00028 class PosEventFilter(QObject):
00029         ## @brief Creates a new PosEventFilter object.
00030         def __init__(self, parent=None):
00031                 QObject.__init__(self, parent)
00032                 self.currentWidget = None
00033                 self.keyboard = None
00034 
00035         ## @brief Reimplements eventFilter() to show a Keyboard when a QLineEdit or QTextEdit gets
00036         # the focus.
00037         def eventFilter(self, obj, event):
00038                 if event.type() == QEvent.MouseButtonPress:
00039                         if obj != self.currentWidget:
00040                                 if obj.inherits( 'QLineEdit' ) or obj.inherits( 'QTextEdit' ):
00041                                         self.currentWidget = obj
00042                                         if self.keyboard:
00043                                                 try:
00044                                                         self.keyboard.setParent(None)
00045                                                         del self.keyboard
00046                                                 except:
00047                                                         pass
00048                                                 self.keyboard = None
00049 
00050                                         if obj.parent() and ( obj.parent().inherits( 'FloatFieldWidget' ) or obj.parent().inherits( 'IntegerFieldWidget' ) ): 
00051                                                 self.keyboard = KeypadWidget( obj )
00052                                         else:
00053                                                 self.keyboard = KeyboardWidget( obj )
00054 
00055                 elif event.type() == QEvent.FocusOut:
00056                         if obj and obj == self.currentWidget and self.keyboard:
00057                                 self.keyboard = None
00058                                 self.currentWidget = None
00059                 return QObject.eventFilter( self, obj, event )
00060
